renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,C){\
	float i,g,e,s,l;\
    vec3 p,q;\
    for(i=0.;++i<50.;){\
        vec3 p=g*normalize(vec3((C-.5*iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y,1))\
        	+vec3(1,1,iTime);\
        q=p;\
        s=1.;\
        for(int j=0;j++<3;)\
            p=mod(p-3.,2.)-1.,\
            l=2./dot(p,p),\
            p*=l,\
            s*=l;\
        g+=e=length(p.xy)/s;\
        if(e<.003)break;\
	}\
    O.xyz+=cos(q*5.3)*15./i;\
}
renderpass.name: Image
